languages.text: Incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} is increased by +<u>(5 + 3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% until the end of combat. Does not stack.
